# quiz_flutter_app

A sample quiz app using flutter

## preview

[![Watch the Video](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/33179999/294647479-b5ef0cbd-7990-4831-b9d2-2b58d38c352f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..m-Gx4raNqwgONGAdUVCODERzvljZgRoO1opo37_2iSY)](https://vimeo.com/900313153?share=copy)

## about the lesson

https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-flutter-dart-to-build-ios-android-apps/learn/lecture/37131048#overview

## how to run

1. install dependencies

   flutter pub get

2. tentukan device

   ctrl + shift + p

   > Flutter: Select Device

3. running app

   on tab bar : run > start debugging or press F5
